fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill.
- Select two players. All visitors to them will be redirected to you.
- Redirect everyone in the game to you. (Costs 9 Gold) (2 Uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever a Civilization attacks a player, they will be redirected to you for that night.
- You may perform the Factional Kill and redirect in the same night.
- Civilizations are not immune to your abilities.
- Roleblock and Redirect Immunity

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: “They were conquered by a Roman legion.” (Factional Kill)
